name: Mission Action (formerly Dolores Street Community Services)
description: Mission Action helps low-income and immigrant communities for a fairer society. They provide housing, shelter, and support. They also fight for women's and immigrant rights and have a community engagement program.
fullDescription: Mission Action helps low-income and immigrant communities for a fairer society. They provide housing, shelter, and support. They also fight for women's and immigrant rights and have a community engagement program.
whatTheyOffer: Mission Action helps low-income and immigrant communities for a fairer society. They provide housing, shelter, and support. They also fight for women's and immigrant rights and have a community engagement program.
